solution_line_template: If Brayan drinks {brayan_cups_per_hour} cups of coffee in an hour, twice what Ivory drinks, then Ivory drinks {brayan_cups_per_hour}/{ratio_brayan_to_ivory} = <<{brayan_cups_per_hour}/{ratio_brayan_to_ivory}={ivory_cups_per_hour}>>{ivory_cups_per_hour} cups of coffee in an hour.
Together, they drink {brayan_cups_per_hour}+{ivory_cups_per_hour} = <<{brayan_cups_per_hour}+{ivory_cups_per_hour}={total_cups_per_hour}>>{total_cups_per_hour} cups of coffee in an hour.
After {total_hours} hours, they will drink {total_hours}*{total_cups_per_hour} = <<{total_hours}*{total_cups_per_hour}={total_cups_in_5_hours}>>{total_cups_in_5_hours} cups of coffee together.
